definition: surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)

sentences.english: Part 3 Rococo music and Chinoiserie in the 18th century.
sentences.chinese: 洛可可音乐风格与18世纪“中国热”。

sentences.english: The Rococo is a predominantly French style of the mid-18th century.
sentences.chinese: 洛可可主要是一个法国风格的十八世纪中叶。

sentences.english: The essence of Rococo art is light.
sentences.chinese: 洛可可风格的精髓就是明亮。

sentences.english: The rococo did not die immediately, but it was quickly tamed .
sentences.chinese: 洛可可并没有马上消失，但很快的变的平淡。

sentences.english: The Rococo decoration inside the palace is delightful.
sentences.chinese: 宫殿内的洛可可式装饰风格赏心悦目。

sentences.english: There are two major porcelain rooms in Europe with pieces combining chinoiserie with the Rococo .
sentences.chinese: 掺合洛可可与中国风格的陶瓷屋欧洲共有两座。

sentences.english: The intricate detail of a rococo altarpiece.
sentences.chinese: 洛可可式圣坛背壁装饰画的复杂细节。
